meanings.definition: A small floating aquatic plant with tiny leaves.
meanings.sent1: The pond was covered in duckweed, creating a green carpet on the water.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study duckweed to understand its role in the ecosystem.
meanings.sent3: The duckweed whispered secrets to the fish swimming below.
meanings.sent4: The duckweed danced gracefully on the surface of the pond.
meanings.sent5: The duckweed multiplied rapidly, spreading across the entire lake.

meanings.definition: To avoid something by moving quickly out of the way.
meanings.sent1: The rabbit duckweed under the bush to escape the approaching fox.
meanings.sent2: She duckweed the flying ball just in time to avoid getting hit.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy clown tried to duckweed the banana peel but slipped anyway.
meanings.sent4: He duckweed the falling branch with a swift sidestep.
meanings.sent5: The ninja duckweed the enemy's attack with a quick roll to the side.
